issue.title: [Snyk] Upgrade d3-zoom from 1.2.0 to 1.8.3

repository.name: d3
repository.description: Bring data to life with SVG, Canvas and HTML. :bar_chart::chart_with_upwards_trend::tada:

issue.body:
Snyk has created this PR to upgrade d3-zoom from 1.2.0 to 1.8.3.

:information_source: Keep your dependencies up-to-date. This makes it easier to fix existing vulnerabilities and to more quickly identify and fix newly disclosed vulnerabilities when they affect your project.
- The recommended version is **14 versions** ahead of your current version. - The recommended version was released **a year ago**, on 2019-08-10.
Release notes
Package name: d3-zoom
  • 1.8.3 - 2019-08-10
    • Fix handling of filtered multitouch gestures. #176
  • 1.8.2 - 2019-08-10
    • Fix handling of filtered multitouch gestures. #176
  • 1.8.1 - 2019-08-09
    • Fix consuming of wheel events when the scale extent is reached. #158
  • 1.8.0 - 2019-08-09
    • Add optional point to zoom.transform and related methods. #184
    • Fix d3.zoomTransform to inherit the transform from the closest ancestor, if any.
  • 1.7.4 - 2019-08-07
    • Fix default zoom.extent to consider the SVG viewBox. #177
    • Fix default zoom.filter to ignore control-click. #181
    • Fix default zoom.touchable if navigator.maxTouchPoints. #162
    • Fix default zoom.wheelDelta if deltaMode !== 0. #157 Thanks, @Dakkaron!
    • Fix handling of filtered multitouch gestures. #124 #176 Thanks, @robinhouston and @testower!
    • Fix handling of orphaned gestures. #60
    • Fix emitting of end event when wheel events are ignored. #158 Thanks, @Herst!
    • Fix emitting of zoom events during dbltap gestures. #75 Thanks, @cambecc!
    • Update dependencies.
    • Adopt exact paths for imports.
    • Adopt explicit files for publishing.
  • 1.7.3 - 2018-08-24
    • Housekeeping.
  • 1.7.2 - 2018-08-24
    • Update dependencies.
  • 1.7.1 - 2017-10-30
    • Fix touch-based zooming.
  • 1.7.0 - 2017-10-25
    • Add zoom.constrain. (#118)
  • 1.6.0 - 2017-10-03
    • Add zoom.touchable.
  • 1.5.0 - 2017-07-14
  • 1.4.0 - 2017-07-14
  • 1.3.1 - 2017-07-12
  • 1.3.0 - 2017-05-30
  • 1.2.0 - 2017-05-11
from d3-zoom GitHub release notes
Commit messages
Package name: d3-zoom
  • 3c95789 1.8.3
  • 523ccff Fix filtering of multitouch gestures. #176
  • 7a4a0cc 1.8.2
  • 176ad73 Revert "Use touches rather than changedTouches in touchstarted"
  • 4d4fbb9 1.8.1
  • 39e4974 Revert f4c6c792a26a6293a3e43911f2117e28852329c2.
  • 8519899 1.8.0
  • f653ce4 Remove line numbers.
  • 280450c Document zoomTransform‚Äôs inheritance.
  • fbd16ed Allow a reference point to be specified.
  • 6bf7b7c 1.7.4
  • 3ff441a Update dependencies.
  • fb45138 Fold into gesture.taps.
  • a284673 Fix #75 - define tap as [touchstart, touchend] and dbltap as two quick taps
  • 295cb42 Fix #181 - ignore control-click.
  • a0821c3 Shorten.
  • 30d47e0 Adjust wheel normalization.
  • f21cdfd Normalize defaultWheelDelta
  • f4c6c79 Emit end event after last zoom which had an effect
  • b200bb2 Fix #60 - handle orphaned gestures.
  • a84dba2 Return if there is no active gesture
  • c4734c2 Use touches rather than changedTouches in touchstarted
  • 911807f Fix #162 - touchable if maxTouchPoints.
  • 17d4032 Fix #177 - consider viewBox for default extent.
Compare
**Note:** *You are seeing this because you or someone else with access to this repository has authorized Snyk to open upgrade PRs.* For more information: üßê [View latest project report](https://app.snyk.io/org/skitionek/project/4a660cb7-4ac5-439f-959a-58f6f9749f0a?utm_source=github&utm_medium=upgrade-pr) üõ† [Adjust upgrade PR settings](https://app.snyk.io/org/skitionek/project/4a660cb7-4ac5-439f-959a-58f6f9749f0a/settings/integration?utm_source=github&utm_medium=upgrade-pr) üîï [Ignore this dependency or unsubscribe from future upgrade PRs](https://app.snyk.io/org/skitionek/project/4a660cb7-4ac5-439f-959a-58f6f9749f0a/settings/integration?pkg=d3-zoom&utm_source=github&utm_medium=upgrade-pr#auto-dep-upgrades)

issue.body:
Snyk has created this PR to upgrade d3-zoom from 1.0.3 to 1.8.3.

![merge advice](https://app.snyk.io/badges/merge-advice/?package_manager=npm&package_name=d3-zoom&from_version=1.0.3&to_version=1.8.3&pr_id=9fa8ffdc-93d3-4f80-bb88-8f024993799c&visibility=true&has_feature_flag=false) :information_source: Keep your dependencies up-to-date. This makes it easier to fix existing vulnerabilities and to more quickly identify and fix newly disclosed vulnerabilities when they affect your project.
- The recommended version is **21 versions** ahead of your current version. - The recommended version was released **3 years ago**, on 2019-08-10.
Release notes
Package name: d3-zoom
  • 1.8.3 - 2019-08-10
    • Fix handling of filtered multitouch gestures. #176
